channel.title: transformers on Game6r

item.title: Decepticons game
item.description: While playing the Decepticons, you find yourself in ancient times, when the home planet of all transformers - Cybertron, was still inhabited. The race of robots was divided into two warring camps, the leaders of each of which dreamed of power over Cybertron. Help one of the heroes of the game to get to the vault, which contains an ancient artifact that can restore peace on the planet of robots.
